welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Prostejov, a charming city known for its beautiful architecture, rich history and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and discover all that our city has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories here in Prostejov!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Olomouc Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Olomouc Airport is used for the transportation of goods and freight.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
